Queries.AddBikeInfo: INSERT INTO ct_db.bikeinfo (B_ID, B_Chng_Date, B_KM_ODO, B_Mobile_Go, B_Next_ODO, B_Insrt_Person) VALUES(@B_ID, @B_Chng_Date, @B_KM_ODO, @B_Mobile_Go, @B_Next_ODO, @B_Insrt_Person);
Queries.UpdateBikeData: UPDATE ct_db.bikeinfo SET B_KM_ODO = @B_KM_ODO, B_Mobile_Go = @B_Mobile_Go, B_Next_ODO = @B_Next_ODO, B_Updt_Person = @B_Updt_Person WHERE B_ID = @B_ID;
